price: 66. Waxaana u waxyoonnay arrinkan ah in cidhibta kuwaas (gaalada ah) la goyn subaxa horeba.
arabic: وَقَضَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡهِ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡأَمۡرَ أَنَّ دَابِرَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ مَقۡطُوعٞ مُّصۡبِحِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waqaḍaynā ilayhi dhālika al-amra anna dābira hāulāi maqṭūʿun muṣ'biḥīna
